# AVSampleBufferRequest.Direction.reverse

**Case**

The number of previous samples may be zero or greater.

## Declaration

```swift
case reverse
```

## Discussion

The number of previous samples allowed is subject to the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVSampleBufferRequest/limitCursor], [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVSampleBufferRequest/preferredMinSampleCount], and [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVSampleBufferRequest/maxSampleCount] property values.

## Buffer direction

- **AVSampleBufferRequest.Direction.forward**: The number of following samples may be zero or greater.
- **AVSampleBufferRequest.Direction.none**: A single sample will be loaded.
